confirmEncryptionChanged: After changing the encryption key, you won't be able to decrypt files encrypted with the previous key. All new created or uploaded files will be encrypted with the new key. Are you sure you want to continue?
encryptionExplanation: This is an experimental feature, which will encrypt (on the server side) all files created or uploaded with this app. This is not an end to end encryption. If you forget the bucket encryption key, you will loose the content of the encrypted files. Use with caution!
dragMode: Enable dragging files outside of the application
